website_summaries.verdict: This portable TV offers impressive crisp images and lots of features for a model in its class.
pros: Owners rave about the sharp picture quality
Includes AC/DC adapters but can also be powered with the built-in rechargeable battery
cons: Some TVs had faulty batteries that wouldn't stay charged
otherwise, the rechargeable battery is a handy feature
Tuning the channels can be tricky

customer_reviews.title: We'll use this tv when the weather is bad and we lose our dish signal
customer_reviews.text: I live about 30 miles from downtown Houston, so the small antennas provide wouldn't work. However, once I installed a more powerful indoor antenna, I receive all of the local stations very well. We'll use this tv when the weather is bad and we lose our dish signal.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear picture on the ONE channel scanned.  No Customer Service!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the TV to scan and remember the local channels. Stored one channel, my little Philips stored 9 channels with the same antenna and positioning. The picture quality on the one channel was superb (shame it didn't work better). I emailed Tyler, but got no response-so customer service is non-existant.
customer_reviews.author: oblivioustoall

customer_reviews.title: Returned It
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. First problem, no screws for the base. Second, confusing set-up directions. Third, cannot reach Tyler customer service for assistance. When I called Amazon, even THEY could not find a number for Tyler's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet P. Mandel

customer_reviews.title: overall a good little tv for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on a screen porch with no space for a larger tv. I live in a city so am able to pick up 13 channels with good reception with the included antennas. Have access to a few more stations if I adjust the antenna a little. I was thinking of returning the tv when I realized it had only a USB port and no HDMI for connecting a ROKU to watch some cable type tv stations. However, I discovered that the ROKU express + for older tv's could be used with this little TV so I purchased one and kept the TV for porch use and am quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Moronic base design
customer_reviews.text: The base on this TV was designed by someone with a minus 10 IQ. There are two little screws to connect the parts, and NO WAY to get them positioned. I had to remove all the screws from the base faceplate just to have some way to move the screws into the holes. It took a freaking hour to put two base pieces together. Most absolutely stupid design I have ever encountered. Of course there are no instructions because there is no way to do it. The sound and picture are quite good or I would have given it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Not much help
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a portable, battery operated (8 d cell batteries) and it was so nice. I could be in an interior room with aluminum foil around the antenna and get my NBC station to follow weather reports. This tv has a good picture and sound but it does not get ABC, CBS or NBC stations. It gets Create, PBS, Kids PBS, Hillsong, Frazier Metodist and a couple others but nothing that would give me info during a tornado or hurricane when the power goes off. And I used all three antenna with same results. Wish my old portable tv would still work!😢
customer_reviews.author: cray

customer_reviews.title: Great quality picture!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the fact that it took forever to receive this tv., apparently got lost in the mail. Great quality picture, good volume, lots of channels it pulled up including some that we don’t even receive on our cable tv at home. It doesn’t keep a long charge, it gave me about 1hour worth of viewing. I bought this for use while at car shows or while in the cellar waiting out storms but I will now use it in my bathroom while getting ready since it’s overall a great tv.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sedlacek

customer_reviews.title: the picture and sound quality are very good; however
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the picture and sound quality are very good; however, assembly of the base was required and the instructions were poor, let alone the design of putting the base on - it does not sit correctly as pictured on the box. It's still usable. Also, it would have been nice to have a better list of the items included with the television and better television set up instructions. Time will tell how well it works over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far. I haven't had much luck in getting enough channels (over air) with the supplied antennas. I only got about 10 channels. What did work well was using an indoor HDTV digital antenna that I already had....THEN I got 90 channels that worked. The sound quality was....ehhh, but you do get good volume range. Picture quality is pretty good. Will need to see what the battery life is like. But in a situation like a longer lasting power outage, I would make sure a nice fully charged laptop power bank (with AC outlets) is around to help extend the tv watching time.
customer_reviews.author: Bionic Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Very weak receiver..No customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was intended as a replacement for a 9 inch television in our kitchen.We have always successfully connected these receivers to an outdoor antenna on our roof. I made the connection, but did not receive a satisfactory signal. I tried repeatedly to get assistance from customer service with no reponse. I finally asked for outside assistance.That person confirmed that I had properly connected the TV to the antenna, but that the TV receiver was too weak.to receive the digital signals. We had to return the TV
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Rosenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV for my bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased with this tv. I’m getting local channels easily with the included antennas and the connection holds. I can’t get as clear a picture as I did on a little 13 yr old 8” color tv that just gave out. I miss a dark/light scroll knob. On this tv you have to set it thru the menu. That’s for all stations so you can’t adjust as you go. I wouldn’t advise using the picture adjustments on the menu. It can be a disaster. I have always used a little tv need on my bathroom counter while I get ready in the morning. This fits the purpose fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold charge.
customer_reviews.text: We li e in a large city. It's great reception everywhere it's place. Great picture. We really have no use for the battery since we're using the tv where power is available. That being said, when we tested the battery for use without being plug in, it absolutely did not hold a charge. Very short veiwing time, less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya N.

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be of good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Picture and sound quality are good. I didn't find the reception was good from the included antenna options. That isn't a fault of the tv, but a simple problem of my location and distance from a transmission tower. In my case I need a additional purchase of a more powerful antenna because of my location. The TV is simple to operate and with every other Tv it's really all about the reception, whether cable or antenna so consider that when you make your purchase. I gave it 4 stares because I like it, can't say I love it, my enthusiasm doesn't extend that far.
customer_reviews.author: Dobe

customer_reviews.title: Inputs don't work
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that works is the antenna input. I've tried multiple AV cables and devices, I've tried multiple USB devices, multiple SD cards nothing. AV always gives no signal messages everything else acts as if there's nothing connected, the USB doesn't even send a charging current to my phone leading me to believe it is not in any way connected. If you're just looking for something to pick up local channels it's fine, I wouldn't trust it for cable, but if you looking for a multi-use device look further. I'll be looking into sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Fred Wilmark

customer_reviews.title: Poor reception even with long range added antenna.
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping to get a portable/battery operated tv to use when the electricity goes out. This is my 2nd purchase within a year in an attempt to purchase a portable/battery operated tv. Live in blizzard and tornado area so kind of a necessity. Even after purchasing an extend radius antenna for up to 150 miles still do not have good reception. Great picture for about 15 minutes and then scrambles both picture and sound. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wapsie Yorkies

customer_reviews.title: Tyler TV
customer_reviews.text: Due to our current power shortage situation in Puerto Rico, I purchased this TV as it was battery operated. The image is excellent, reception not extraordinary, but it's ok. The battery lasts for less than one hour and that does not work for me as we don't know when we will have power back. Still, the quality and size of this tv is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: HAR

customer_reviews.title: Great customer interaction and support from the seller
customer_reviews.text: Great customer interaction and support from the seller. I was hopeful to get more channels than able. Do your local signal availability home work first. It's free and on the web. Nice design, clean lines. Lots of extra goodies and very good picture quality. Additional signal boost antenna didn't help with reception. Remote is tiny and difficult to use by larger fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little TV does the job
customer_reviews.text: I just received this little television. Which Thank you Seller for shipping it before the timeframe. After setting it up and scanning the channels. They do come in great and clear. A couple was wanting to not come in. But in all fairness, I was in a spot that the reception does goes out here and there and it was a channel, I don't normally watch. The remote is small and confusing, but I didn't look at the directions, soooo. The battery in the remote usually does last a very long time, so that is good. So far, I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James P

customer_reviews.title: Light well working portable T.V
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother and she is happy with the product. Picture quality is very acceptable and the sound ,while a little tinny, is very clear and the volume gets loud for a small television. Was able to get about 45 ota channels. Buttons on the remote are extremely small and she is not a fan of it but it does what it is suppose to do. So far so good. Only time will tell how well this television will last.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Black

customer_reviews.title: Tyler ttv703 10 inch portable tv
customer_reviews.text: perfect for watching tv outside while grilling. also perfect when we lost statalite signal due to bad winter storms and heavy rain down pours. Great way to stay informed when there is a power outage. it is worth having it on hand when in need.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: so far the product works fine bought it mostly for hurricane season since the last ...
customer_reviews.text: so far the product works fine bought it mostly for hurricane season since the last one i had the internal battery came apart and leaked into the unit so it would not work, like the 10' inch screen my old one was 7' picture is good and with an external antenna i bought picks up over the air channels just fine east to set up and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: philip bonitto

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, great picture. I am disappointed in the battery life. My second test of a fully charged battery lasted almost 2 hours. I purchased this to use incase of a power failure during hurricanes, and do not feel that this is the tool I was looking for. Keeping it just to use for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Db

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portable Television
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup - 56 channels received in Phoenix with the supplied stick antenna, 85 channels when connected to a roof antenna. The picture is good and watchable. Using the USB input ports to play videos from my flash drives was an unexpected addition. The batteries lasted for 2 1/2 hours on the initial charge, long enough to watch a movie with time to spare. What more could you hope for?
customer_reviews.author: StewartJay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...
customer_reviews.text: We've used this TV several times with the HD antenna I purchased for it, and love it. We use this TV in our storm shelter with a magnetic-base HD antenna attached to the sliding metal door top on the outside, and it's like watching TV in the house. This TV rocks for what we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: An awful experience!
customer_reviews.text: The TV is very portable, and detachable antennas are an useful feature. However, the signal has been very very poor, including with an indoor long range digital antenna (I live in a metropolitan area). The battery life is too short. I tried several strategies, but the tv didn't function adequately (not even in the yard). The experience with this tv has been like a nightmare. I returned it, but was sent to me again. I threw it in the trash. It has been a waste of time and money. I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PRP

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. No real instructions as to set up - I am NOT a geek!! Had no idea where to begin to get it operational.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little TV. I thought I would have to buy another antenna to get the channels I wanted, but the included antennas worked just fine. And it also runs on the built-in battery. So it is totally portable. So now I can sit on the patio and watch the evening news.
customer_reviews.author: Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable tv
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I bought this TV, but works as advertised, only tried it once to see if it would work. Worked pretty good got several channels clear. Good for storm, after charging, it seems to only last 15-20 minutes, bought for storm, thought says 1 1/2 hours on charge, should probably have sent it back. Lowered my
customer_reviews.author: paul johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and would make great gift
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Tyler 10-inch portable TV for my motorhome and to take on trips with me. I immediately found myself using it in far more ways! I now use it in the kitchen while cooking, I take it outside in the morning so I can watch the news while having my coffee, and my wife now steals it for the bath room for her bath! My daughter now wants one for herself to take camping! Best money I ever spent! Very low price for what you get, love my reception, the sound is great and holds charge for over two hours! Need to buy a carry case for it as you'll be taking it everywhere like we do!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sarna

customer_reviews.title: Super portable TV
customer_reviews.text: Just received this tv to replace a 5-inch. Ten inches, We love it. TV easy to set up, easy to run channel scan. Just go through Menu. (And I think manufacturer read reviews and added second instruction sheet to explain how to connect tv to base.) Color is great, sound is great, picture very good for small, portable tv. Yes, remote is compact with smaller buttons but that's what my glasses are for. It came with three different antennas, which was unexpected but very cool. We can connect the cable tv cable, too. Taking this tv out on the deck to enjoy summer evenings!
customer_reviews.author: Stampcos

customer_reviews.title: 10 inch Tyler television
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the 10 inch Tyler television! Picture quality and sound are excellent! We bought a 9 inch SuperSonic in the past when the sound stopped working after eight months! So far so good with Tyler! Update 10/3/18 The sound is gone on our television! We have done everything possible to have it return! This tv was purchased 6/15/2017! A year plus four months, and now no sound does not make a good tv! What to do??? Help Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV to use as an added portable TV for outside and to follow sports and weather beside my normal TV. It works great and picks a lot of local channels in Albuquerque including a 24 hour weather channel. Very happy with it battery life is about an hour but with video you cant expect a long charge. Nice little TV.
customer_reviews.author: Trampledkarma

customer_reviews.title: ... here in the Phx area and it does work better than the other one I bought before this one ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this product and used it here in the Phx area and it does work better than the other one I bought before this one but it doesnt pick up some of my local channels missing a few but it is okay. I took it to ca. with me and it worked fine except there it didnt pick up a few local channels as well.. But worth buying it does come with a few different antenna's so one will work for you. Pleased with this product...
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reception.
customer_reviews.text: This TV was to replace my old RCA portable TV with the antenna. I was able to get all the local channels. I installed the unit with the antennas and I can only get one local channel CBS. Not happy. If I need additional equipment it should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: SOPHIE

customer_reviews.title: Gets local stations
customer_reviews.text: Gets several stations & allows me to watch local news since I stream everything else. It’s small & portable - the antenna has to be jiggled for different stations but I’m pleased with the reception. For the price, I’d recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: 3 hour battery life
customer_reviews.text: A great item to have in the case of power outages if one lives in Northern CA where power is turned off so often.
customer_reviews.author: bob g.

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I've had 2 of the larger versions ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I've had 2 of the larger versions with DVD players and they're so big and bulky. This is perfect! I don't always want a DVD player or huge speakers. I use this while I work anywhere and the antenna that came with it is just fine. I pick up a lot of channels.
customer_reviews.author: Knox1981

customer_reviews.title: Television stopped operating after three months
customer_reviews.text: Product leave much to be desired. I use the Television sparsely only at work to watch the news. I TV was playing and it suddenly went off. I tried everything to fix the problem but it never turned back on. I then tried to recharge the TV but I still wasn't able to get service. I contacted Amazon who told me that my warranty expired and I had to contact the direct distributor. I will attempt this mind you the TV was inexpensive but three months . The Expiration date should have read last only three months and I would have passed on this model. Buyer be wear!
customer_reviews.author: Not happy

customer_reviews.title: She really love it. Clear picture & sound good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom in Puerto Rico. She really love it. Clear picture & sound good. After being 80 days without electricity due to Hurricane Maria this a great way to know what is happening in the island and give her also the opportunity to watch some of her favorite news & programs.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Pizarro

customer_reviews.title: Decent TV For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and receives almost every local broadcast channel with extension antenna on top of the set. Good design. Menu is clear and buttons for channels and volume on the set work well. We leave this set plugged in, so can't comment on battery life. Picture is a bit grainy versus what you would see on a tablet or laptop, but OK for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies quickly
customer_reviews.text: Good TV. Great picture. However, the battery does not hold a charge for very long. You can get about 2 hours of TV viewing on a full charge if you use it right after unplugging it. The next day, the battery is dead and requires a full charge. There is also a blue plastic tab on the upper right hand corner of the screen with no explanation of what it is for. At first I thought the tab was for removing a protective covering, but all it does is stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Batdorf

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes. But the TV is flimsy in cheap plastic. It won't last long. Also, I had to scan the tuner about 8 times to try to get some channels. I managed to get 4 channels but only after moving to the center of the room. The channels were not watchable. I will have to buy a better antenna and hopefully that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Power plant worker

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I live in Tucson and I am surrounded by mountains. I still managed to pull in over 30 channels. I just wish I knew Spanish. This has a great picture and sound. I have only used the battery feature once and it worked good.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Little TV
customer_reviews.text: This little TV is fantastic. The picture is sharp and the colors jump out at you. The speakers are not the best in the world but I use ear phones and that makes the sound great. This TV is a great value. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Reception is very poor can't get any local channels no matter where I put is.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Roof

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a good assortment of power and signal adapters
customer_reviews.text: Bought TV for use during storm power outages in Florida. Comes with a good assortment of power and signal adapters. Unit worked perfect with no problems during initial setup.
customer_reviews.author: O.R.

customer_reviews.title: TV is ok, other issues
customer_reviews.text: This TV is ok. Bought it to replace my RCA unit that finally died. The main problem I have with it is the magnet base on the antennas, The magnet base is so weak it won't hold the antennas upright in a vertical position, forget about trying to stick the antennas in a horizontal position. Good thing I saved the antenna from the old RCA. otherwise it works.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ski

customer_reviews.title: AV doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: TV’s AV input does not work whatsoever, i plugged it in and it turned on for about 2 seconds then shut off. The AV was the only reason I bought the TV
customer_reviews.author: lukeam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV, Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: From a customer service standpoint, they provided excellent, patient customer service. As for the product, it is excellent. Wonderful reception, wonderful sound, and the picture is crystal clear. So glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: can not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to make the product work. I followed their instructions to the letter . got nothing . can not recommend this product period
customer_reviews.author: Jim  Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I got it so my sister-in-law and brother had something to watch when they went to bed and it’s picture and ability to pull in HD signals are quite good. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy Dreyfuss

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I ordered. I love this thing. I can take it anywhere. The battery lasts at least long enough to watch a movie! Great picture and sound... I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. Only negative is that the instructions are non ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the belief that it would work with my digital cable box and it did. The hook up was simple and it automatically scanned for the correct input. AMAZING. Only negative is that the instructions are non clear. If this was not so intuitive than I could see some people getting frustrated. It was easy for me but I am a graduate engineer so I am used to making things work. But: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Harold L.

customer_reviews.title: GOT THE ANTENNA AMPLIFIER JUST TO BE SURE I GET GOOD RECEPTION.
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS FOR THE NEXT HURRICANE BLACKOUT...DURING IRMA WE HAD NO INFO...ITS STILL IN THE ORIGINAL BOX BUT I RESEARCHED IT BEFORE I PURCHASED IT...GOT THE ANTENNA AMPLIFIER JUST TO BE SURE I GET GOOD RECEPTION...DEFINITELY A MUST HAVE ITEM FOR YOUR HURRICANE READY KIT...
customer_reviews.author: R. Geoffrey Martin

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk. Did not even power on. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: joel2724

customer_reviews.title: Great little tv!
customer_reviews.text: This tv was only receiving 17 over the air channels with the supplied antennas. I purchased a flat plastic stick on the window type antenna & reprogrammed the tuner & I now am receiving 44 channels. I am very happy with the picture & color, the sound is a little tinny but I will eventually ad auxiliary speakers. All & all for the money this tv is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a little tv for the kitchen so I can watch the news while I do the dishes. This TV is perfect. :) The reception is good and it has an antenna that you can move around to get a better signal. It's been working great for me. Use it everyday :)
customer_reviews.author: Babychicago

customer_reviews.title: Have not turned it on yet because I cannot figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not turned it on yet because I cannot figure out all the parts-there is no item/description list enclosed-you have to guess what everything is-it lists briefly how the stand and this odd TV adapter are supposed to hook together but there are no illustrations so it is impossible to figure it out-for me anyway-I have several antennas with no idea what each one is for-some cables that I can't find any use for-if you guys have assembly instructions that would be great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well on with cable box.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough with the cable box for a small TV. Cannot comment about reception using antenna because I live so far out in the country (no nearby stations). Easy to set up. Did the job for which I intended it.
customer_reviews.author: gooddog

customer_reviews.title: Love the 10 widescreen and easy directions and picks up ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had ordered this TV before the last hurricane - it would have come in handy when the power went out for several days! Love the 10 widescreen and easy directions and picks up several local channels.
customer_reviews.author: GZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for hurricane season.
customer_reviews.text: Glad we had this, our only connection to the outside world. Great picture, loved the fact that it came with a variety of antennae and has auxiliary inputs. Bravo.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Fisher (aka J.T.Fisher, Author)

customer_reviews.title: It works well, but not so well as Craig TV set.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very fast. Thanks. And, I use small TV sets for my outdoor activity and this one has glassy screen that makes me not so comfortable view cause of reflections.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr Taranov

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this portable TV for my Mom and she ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this portable TV for my Mom and she loves it. She carries it outside onto the patio and gets to watch her shows poolside . I am very impressed with the reception and picture quality. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Better  than  Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Searched for a larger screen to use with our security cameras and this TV works amazing . Quite easy to set-up but the amazing thing is the clarity of the picture . Delivery was faster than anticipated
customer_reviews.author: TMDAL

customer_reviews.title: DON'T Buy This P.O.S.
customer_reviews.text: So here I am in the middle of hurricane Irma in Florida. I tried to prepare for the storm as well as possible. Purchased this TV ahead of the storm , charged it , tested it and when the power went out it DID'NT WORK NOT A DAM THING . This sucks . It had a great pic and good reception before but it won't turn on now. Then I plugged it in to a 12 v power source. No lights nothing. This tv is unreliable . It's going back and I will demand a FULL refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy D.

customer_reviews.title: Good little tv
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work at the location for which I purchased it, but it seemed like a great little tv. Picture quality wasn’t great.
customer_reviews.author: Cattlequeen

customer_reviews.title: It working as it should.
customer_reviews.text: ☺️ Works better than I expected! Have not had the chance to use with the batteries only.Otherwise this a great Television to be so small it really is. Chevonne
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent portable TV. I am very, very happy with it. Great picture and sound. The size is excellent too. Maybe the instructions should be more detailed. Previously, I bought Axess 7” tv lcd this is the worst tv that you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: EFerrer

customer_reviews.title: remote control too small
customer_reviews.text: picture quality is excellent! remote control is too small. battery length of time is too short. appears to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Voter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The tv is great. We bought it to use in our toy hauler/camper. The picture is great. The sound is a little tinny but when you plug in headphones, the sound is much better
customer_reviews.author: shayne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reception within a major city.
customer_reviews.text: The reception is terrible even being in a large city with great local reception on regular TV's. The remote control has many great functions but the keys are too close together Sadly, I am returning the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Z

customer_reviews.title: Needs Better Remote & More Thorough Instructions
customer_reviews.text: TV works well, picture is nice, but I'm leaving off a ☆, because you have to press hard on the remote buttons and instructions are really limited. Can't even find much online other than a diagram of the remote buttons.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! Finds stations easily with included antennas. Picture quality outstanding. Customer service responded immediately with my few technical questions. Depending on your location, it may require a more powerful indoor or outdoor antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED THE TV
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the TV. It would not receive any channels, even with using a digital amplified antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Walfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment but I wish was few inches bigger
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mother because the equipment has the capability to use batteries. She is happy and said the image is clear and work good for her to use during the black out in Puerto Rico.
customer_reviews.author: Nilsa C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: *WARNING!!!* DO NOT BUY THIS MEXICAN\SPANISH TV,  YOU WILL REGRET IT!!!*
customer_reviews.text: DAMN CULO SPANISH\MEXICAN LANGUAGE IS A FRICKIN NUISANCE, I HIGHLY REGRET BUYING THIS CRAP TV AND PLAN ON BLOWING IT UP TONIGHT IF I CANT GET IT TO ENGLISH!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BLESS THEE

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price...
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is a bit washed out - but its get several options for antennas in the box
customer_reviews.author: MatthewW

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV the picture is sharp and clear. The reception is good but not great inside my house I don't get all the channels.
customer_reviews.author: Ltech66

customer_reviews.title: Too late to return
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tv for hurricane season. Hurricane Barry hit my area and was out of electricity. TV worked for ten minutes and then cut out. Had no news or weather for 60 hours. Woild not buy.
customer_reviews.author: JAZ

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is shocking
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell u how long the battery last it’s been plugged in in my work shop but I can tell you it is very very clear it could be a little louder but I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Joshua pual Leonard

customer_reviews.title: no charge hook up like phone, I get one channel in San Diego
customer_reviews.text: Full charge internal battery last 15 to max of 30 mins, needs to always be hooked to power source, no charge hook up like phone, I get one channel in San Diego , fox. Nice big picture.
customer_reviews.author: Charles r

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for our camper
customer_reviews.text: A lot of buttons on tiny remote, but the picture quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent better than i expected. You can set also without the control remote. Has a 3 different antenas. Very easy to use. Has different ways to charge also with usb. I like very much.
customer_reviews.author: salserita

customer_reviews.title: Great tailgating TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for watching NFL games while tailgating. Very easy to set up and use. The multiple power options come in handy. Thought we might get to use the battery during Hurricane Florence but our power stayed on. Very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GrandBrad

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my purchase. I bought it for electrical outages emergencies. It is very good you just need the right antenna that best works with your location
customer_reviews.author: zulma rullan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great little TV. Works well on the corner of my desk which was its intended purpose. I would suggest trying all the included antennas to see which works best. I found the wired telescope works best for my situation. Be prepared to scan more than once with the antenna(s) in different places to get the channels you prefer. With no manual, maximizing the remote has a bit of a learning curve. All in all, this unit is exactly what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Three months and it's gone
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting, at least one year of service. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M.Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of garbage never got it to work. Very few instructions. Not enough directions. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: susan gulino

customer_reviews.title: Just Not Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Setup and range not very good even with an antenna.
customer_reviews.author: gldsooner

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: Like this product. Great picture. Wish it had output for external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great portable TV for the storm shelter
customer_reviews.text: A good little TV at a great price. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cline

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: It did what it was meant to do . The TV picked up 11 stations in a very rural area and over 45 in a Large City. I was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu03

customer_reviews.title: There's an Antenna?
customer_reviews.text: This tv doesn't really pull in the channels unless attached to a 'high' antenna. By itself it doesn't pull in 100% of the signal and delivers an annoying pixelated picture for most channels. I would not but this again.
customer_reviews.author: gymlock

customer_reviews.title: No user guide. Does not seem to be one ...
customer_reviews.text: No user guide. Does not seem to be one available. Can't determine how to fit the picture to the full screen-space at top and bottom. Can't turn TV off/on with cable remote, but can change channels and adjust volume.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Stickelman

customer_reviews.title: This item appeared used. The screen was scratched in ...
customer_reviews.text: This item appeared used. The screen was scratched in several places and fingerprints on the unit. The TV did not even power on and was promptly returned.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: its a small tv for on the go
customer_reviews.text: great tv worth its money, gets great reception, and easy to set up, husband loves it. would buy its again
customer_reviews.author: venie

customer_reviews.title: May deserve a higher rating, but...
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be okay, so far. My biggest problem was attaching the tv stand to the monitor. There were no instructions for assembly included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Check the No. of input jacks
customer_reviews.text: This TV did not have enough input ports to hook up my satellite tv. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rogin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Picture and color very good as is reception! Sound is limited due to the small size of the package but still good.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Prince

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived quickly. Just like in a description Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly. Just like in a description Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Gal On Mordchai
